title: Litro to start distributing gas from Wednesday (1)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Litro gas company states that a shipment of 3,500 metric ton of gas is due to arrive in Colombo at 1:00 PM tomorrow (30).
Accordingly, the company states that if the weather permits, the ship will be able to berth at Kerawalapitiya, and the gas will be tested, which is expected to take 10 hours.
Therefore, the company says that Litro gas will be distributed from Wednesday (1) onwards, and requested the public NOT to stay in queues.
